summary: Plan and build a business introduction app (inspired by Zippy’s Errand Services website) for a delivery/errand service business.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimalist delivery/errand service logo mark with text “Zippy’s Errand Services” (zippys-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner illustration of a friendly local courier delivering groceries/food bags in a neighborhood, warm palette (zippys-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive business introduction website-style app for a local delivery/errand service (inspired by Zippy’s Errand Services) with clear sections for: business overview, services offered, how it works, and contact information.

Add a Services section that highlights at least three service categories: Grocery Delivery, Restaurant Delivery, and Special Delivery (pickup/drop-off from local stores), each with a short description and a clear call-to-action.

Implement a “Request an Errand / Contact” form that collects: name, phone number, optional email, service type (grocery/restaurant/special), pickup details, drop-off details, notes, and preferred time window; validate required fields on the client.

Add an admin-only page in the frontend to review submitted requests (read-only list + detail view). Protect access using Internet Identity authentication and restrict viewing to a configured admin principal list in the backend.

Apply a cohesive, distinct visual theme appropriate for a local errand/delivery business (avoid blue/purple): warm, trustworthy colors (e.g., charcoal + cream + orange accents), friendly typography, consistent spacing, and clear CTAs across the app.

Add generated static brand assets and wire them into the UI: a simple logo and a hero illustration/banner on the landing page. Store generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a business introduction app for a delivery/errand service business (basic business app).
Create backend support to store submitted contact/request form entries in stable canister storage, including created timestamp, and provide query methods to fetch entries (for an owner/admin view).

projectName: Business introduction app for a delivery/errand service
